import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'], }) export class SignupComponent implements OnInit{ signupForm!:FormGroup constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.signupForm = this.formBuilder.group ({ name:[''], email:[''], mobile:[''], password:[''] }) } }
